thread.title_full: WATCH: WestJet flight attendant's funny safety demonstration | WATCH | Canada |

author: Postmedia Network
title: WATCH: WestJet flight attendant's funny safety demonstration | WATCH | Canada |
text:
A WestJet flight attendant's funny safety demonstration has made him a viral sensation.
In a video posted to Facebook by Saskatchewan-based TM'z Veterinary Clinic , flight attendant Michael McAdam can be seen acting out the pre-flight safety demonstration. The video has since gone viral with more than 5.5 million views.
" We had the best in flight crew on West Jet," the clinic posted to Facebook along with the video. "Laughed so hard... Enjoy, we certainly did!"
 Flying home from the fabulous TPLO conference.... We had the best in flight crew on West Jet. Laughed so hard. Only had a chance to video the French portion of the pre flight instructions ! Enjoy, we certainly did !
Posted by TM'z Veterinary Clinic on Saturday, August 1, 2015 WestJet flight attendant Caralee Savage made news earlier this year when she danced in the aisle to Mark Ronson and Bruno Mars' popular song "Uptown Funk."
